channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Yankee Candles
channel.desc: Since 1969, Yankee Candles have been made in the US from superior materials, including their premium fragrance oils. Fill your home with a wonderfully romantic atmosphere and exquisite scents.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Botanical Christmas Gift
channel.desc: If you're a fan of Liz Earle's natural skincare, then you won't want to miss this show, highlighting the products packed with botanicals.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Offers End Today
channel.desc: Looking for fantastic offers? Then look no further than our special show, bringing you all the latest deals. But hurry - these won't be around for long.

channel.title: Christmas gift Ideas with Yankee
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift for someone special with our Yankee Candle selection. With an incredible variety of scents, sizes and styles to choose from, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Big Deal Morning Show
channel.desc: Start your week with a first look at some of the most exciting limited time offers at QVC across home, garden, beauty and fashion in The Big Deal Morning Show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim and Co Trending Looks
channel.desc: Refresh your wardrobe with Denim & Co.'s trending looks. Discover must-have styles and easy-to-wear pieces perfect for every season and occasion.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Christmas Grotto
channel.desc: Step into our Christmas Grotto! Discover a world of festive decorations and dazzling lights. Plus, fill your home with scents from Yankee Candle, made with premium fragrance oils.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Yankee Candles
channel.desc: Since 1969, Yankee Candles have been made in the US from superior materials, including their premium fragrance oils. Fill your home with a wonderfully romantic atmosphere and exquisite scents.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Oisha Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover the world of Oisha - elegant jewellery that you'll treasure forever. Exquisitely crafted in India, each captivating piece will sit on your skin as a work of art in breath-taking detail.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Shop with Yankee
channel.desc: Enter our Christmas Shop, where you'll discover all manner of festive delights. This time, we've got aromatic home fragrance from Yankee Candle to fill your home with seasonal scents.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Skechers Footwear
channel.desc: Step out in style in Skechers! Renowned for their on-trend, sporty designs, you can now find their fab shoes at QVC too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Shay & Blue Boutique Fragrance
channel.desc: Established in 2012, Shay & Blue is an award-winning boutique perfumery based in London's Marylebone that brings a contemporary twist to artisan fragrance.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Perricone MD Skincare
channel.desc: Today's show focuses on NV Perricone skincare, specially formulated to tackle the signs of ageing.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Today's Top Tech Gifts
channel.desc: Discover the latest gadgets and electronics in this show, which offers you a range of innovative TVs, computers, tablets and cameras that you and your family will love.

channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with Shay & Blue
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, plus award-winning fragrance from Shay & Blue to inspire you to treat the ones you love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Sosandar Fashion
channel.desc: Unveil your chic side with Sosandar! Discover flattering, trendy designs created for real life with longer lengths and unique styles to make you feel sexy, feminine, and confident.

channel.title: Winter Boots on 4 Pay
channel.desc: Winter Boots on 4 Pay.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Finery London
channel.desc: Tune in to see the modern and sophisticated Finery London womenswear range, with a focus on stylish detail and beautiful fabrics to make sure your wardrobe reflects your individuality.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.title: The Fashion Edit with Caroline

channel.title: Kelly Hoppen Home Design
channel.desc: Kelly Hoppen is a renowned interior designer and now she's created a range just for QVC! It includes fine linens, cushions and accent pieces featuring her signature style.

channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.
